confirmEmail.title: Confirm Your Email!
confirmEmail.message: We're excited to have you on board! Before we get started, we need you to confirm your Email.
confirmEmail.description: Thank you for joining Telemediker, your trusted partner for efficient and reliable</br> logistics solutions. To complete your registration and start using our platform,</br> please confirm your email by clicking the link below:
confirmEmail.closing: Welcome to the future of logistics with Telemediker!

passwordReset.title: Password reset
passwordReset.message: We received a request to reset your PickUp2 account password. If you initiated this request, please click the link below to reset your password:
passwordReset.expiryMessage: For security reasons, the link will expire in 1 hour. If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email—your account remains safe and no changes have been made.
passwordReset.supportMessage: If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team.
